ict_header: Opening up the future with the power of ICT
5g_ai_lead: 5G and AI will permeate our lives,
various_changes: Various changes have occurred in life.
make_tomorrow_better: Making tomorrow more convenient, more comfortable, and easier
in_order_to: In order to make it better,
use_technology: we use the latest technology to
mobile_communication_desc: We contribute to the realization of comfortable mobile communications and the stabilization of communications infrastructure.
ict_solution_desc: We contribute to corporate activities through various system development and infrastructure construction.
security_desc: We provide solutions to protect safety and security, such as strengthening corporate security and crime prevention measures in the community.
engineering_desc: We provide construction services such as product installation, electrical equipment, and communication work to realize comfortable construction that meets customer needs.
human_resource_desc: We respond to corporate needs with staffing, recruitment, and BPO services, supporting appropriate talent matching and improving corporate productivity.
entertainment_desc: We aim to revitalize the community through event planning, production, and operation.
